description: Former unionist senator says he is "astonished" that no unionists have been appointed to the Seanad.

maintext: "For all their faults, at least the parties at Stormont are trying to make progress but it seem that is not the case when it comes to politicians in the Republic where they are happy to pay lip service to a shared island.
